channel.title: The Ghost of King's Past
channel.description:
Remember (talking to all you fellow alphaneers, and betaneers out there) that ghost that appeared during the day occasionally? That we all thought was a bug? Well, I did at least..
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/342397246744166410/unknown.png https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/342397306114539521/unknown.png https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/342398392464310273/unknown.png https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/342398822950895616/unknown.png _screenshots by Dooku™ ^_
Screenshots by others: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/342398651290615809/ree.png _(credit: Shield Armor)_
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/261525739617255424/373114261917925381/20170827175505_1.jpg _(credit: Flashu2)_
Screenshots of a discussion I had with cbooman, discussion was posted in #general-tol-english, therefore is subject to redistribution domain and as for, I am legally allowed to repost this discussion. ![image|461x500](upload://h0buEK0xRPAWxMTgDWXAkKltdYY.png) ![image|370x500](upload://40rB5zb7a6tTGecMbyjTeRnrsEq.png) ![image|466x500](upload://ks8QAmNYLAYndeAR5W8BTSB2q1M.png) ![image|504x500](upload://epdUI5JyFv03mhH8g1xJXu9Zqfz.png) ![image|489x500](upload://uPo4IkLNzp1eByhChQUQhW3MWK2.png) ![image|470x500](upload://86aafxFv2aPQP2E6KKaQEHQfwJ4.png) ![image|501x500](upload://cTAMRydKuu2G49GoidCX7UOsMC4.png)
Now the question is, ![image|468x106](upload://llUG4C3StfgIjkmjxtsv9l4vHKQ.png)
Could this mysterious specturious figure be the figure of a king long since passed? Disappointed in what his court, his very kingdom has become? With treachery around every corner, is his goal to set things right..?
Post your ideas on what this may be below! I want to hear YOUR theories! ------------------------
Oh, and in addition- ![image|523x500](upload://iQST3Z5lmiYZBDGUNP2nDKHrwUI.jpg) These two souls, reaped perhaps? Perhaps the king was reaped and his soul was thus trapped in limbo.. Anyways.. let me know what you think!

item.description:
This spectre transcends reaping, he’s breached the barrier between the afterlife, and life itself.

Read full topic

item.title: The Ghost of King's Past
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
I remember I played Reaper and just stands by the corner like Blair Witch Project not by the table and cannot be voted, the only way to stop me was to keep attacking which didn’t occured to them.

Oh yeah, back when Reaper wasn’t unique.

Read full topic

item.description:
Remember (talking to all you fellow alphaneers, and betaneers out there) that ghost that appeared during the day occasionally? That we all thought was a bug? Well, I did at least…

Screenshots of a discussion I had with cbooman, discussion was posted in #general-tol-english, therefore is subject to redistribution domain and as for, I am legally allowed to repost this discussion.






Now the question is,

Could this mysterious specturious figure be the figure of a king long since passed? Disappointed in what his court, his very kingdom has become? With treachery around every corner, is his goal to set things right…?

Post your ideas on what this may be below! I want to hear YOUR theories!

Oh, and in addition-
These two souls, reaped perhaps? Perhaps the king was reaped and his soul was thus trapped in limbo… Anyways… let me know what you think!
